title: Bloomberg Markets: Phillips on Paying Performance Fees
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Phillips on Paying Performance Fees
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Douglas W Phillips Chief Investment Officer University of Rochester Discussing that investment firms are not worth the fees that they charge, yet the best firms charge high fees. He says know the difference between the two and hire the best firms irrespective of fees. Bloomberg News Higher Education Reporter Janet Lorin, also participates in the discussion.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
